criteria_to_evaluate.instruction: Assess the variety and flexibility of the vocabulary used. Is there an attempt to use less common lexical items?
Is the vocabulary used precise and appropriate for the topic? Are there any errors in word choice?
Does the writer effectively use synonyms and rephrasing to avoid repeating words and phrases?

criteria_to_evaluate.point: Control of Spelling and Word Formation
criteria_to_evaluate.instruction: Are there spelling or word formation errors that impede communication?

output_format.positive_feedback: string summarizing strengths based on the criteria
output_format.areas_for_improvement: string summarizing weaknesses based on the criteria
